text: (ehet ovunta nam), deviyange misra novuna dharmayama anugamana kara, (anit dharmayan) pratiksepa kara, allah ek kenekuvama næmada, salatayada nokadava itu kara, sakatayada geva sitina men misa, (vena kisivak mema dutaya magin) ana karanu læbuve næta. (meya ovunge dharmayehida ana karana lada karanavaki). meyama sthira vu (niti riti valin yut) dharmayayi
